ComicInfo.Title: Cracked Interviews R.A.L.F.; One Fine Mid-Afternoon; The Rock Stars Speak; Polly; The Phrenologist!; Star Drek: The Next Cancellation; Railroad Crossing; Yo Yo; Supedupman's 50th Birthday; One Especially Fine Day This Winter; Bummers!; A Public Disservice; Long Shots; The Case of the Guilty Client; Cracked Mirrors; A Deficient World!; One Fine Evening in Transylvania
ComicInfo.Summary:
To celebrate Supedupman's 50th birthday, covers from the 1930s to the 1980s are depicted, noting how the character has changed to adapt to the times. From battling Nazis, to communists to the Japanese industrial boom! However when he tried to lead Afghan rebels against the Russians he discovered Rambo already had that market cornered.
Celebrities look into funhouse mirrors.
